description: A highly volatile mineral only formed during supernovas, thus severely limiting the extent of its distribution. Vital ingredient in capsule production, making it very coveted. May be obtained by reprocessing the following ores and their variations available in low security status star systems: Jaspet, Hemorphite, Hedbergite, Dark Ochre, Crokite It is also present in significant amounts in rare ores like Spodumain and Talassonite.
name: Nocxium
